data.title: Notes From A Kitchen: Volume Three by Jeff Scott — Kickstarter
data.name: Jeff Scott
data.description: Notes From A Kitchen Volume Three is Photographer Jeff Scott’s dramatic follow-up to his 2012 James Beard Award Winning NFAK V1 and V2

data.title: The Kurochka Cookbook: A Book of Russian & Ukrainian Recipes by Yana Barysheva — Kickstarter
data.name: Yana Barysheva
data.description: The Kurochka Cookbook is an illustrated collection of recipes, stories, trivia and tidbits about Russian & Ukrainian food and culture.
